overview: On May 8, 1989, Sports Illustrated ran an article about Ultimate frisbeeâ€¦ about a team with no name hailing from New York City that was about to change the sport forever. From its 1968 New Jersey birth to its unanimous 2015 recognition by the International Olympic Committee, FLATBALL circles the globe to showcase four decades of world-class Ultimate and goes even further: to a set of fields in the Middle East to understand and demystify the unique spirit of the game.
tagline: For the love of the game
title: Flatball: A History of Ultimate
